Mdat.name: name
Mdat.description: The human-readable name of the ADM.

Mdat.name: organization
Mdat.description: The name of the issuing organization of the ADM

Edd.name: ion_version
Edd.description: This is the version of ion is that currently installed.

Tblt.name: exits
Tblt.description: This table lists all of the exits that are defined in the IPN database for the local node.

Tblt.name: plans
Tblt.description: This table lists all of the egress plans that are established in the IPN database for the local node.

Ctrl.name: exit_add
Ctrl.description: This control establishes an exit for static default routing.

Ctrl.name: exit_change
Ctrl.description: This control changes the gateway node number for the exit identified by firstNodeNbr and lastNodeNbr.

Ctrl.name: exit_del
Ctrl.description: This control deletes the exit identified by firstNodeNbr and lastNodeNbr.

Ctrl.name: plan_add
Ctrl.description: This control establishes an egress plan for the bundles that must be transmitted to the neighboring node that is identified by it's nodeNbr.

Ctrl.name: plan_change
Ctrl.description: This control changes the duct expression for the indicated plan.

Ctrl.name: plan_del
Ctrl.description: This control deletes the egress plan for the node that is identified by it's nodeNbr.
